Instrument.name: The Combined Radiometer Spectrophotometer for Mars (KRFM) for Phobos 2
Instrument.description: The The Combined Radiometer Spectrophotometer (KRFM - a Russian acronym) included a radiometer to record thermal radioation from the surface of the target in six subranges covering 5 to 50 microns. The spectrophotometer had a range of 300 - 700 nm, subdivided into 9 intervals.
